title: Hair Salon System
subtitle: Professional Appointment Platform
description: Complete appointment management system with three specialized panels for customers, staff, and admins. Features AI-enhanced visuals, smooth animations, and flexible scheduling. Built with Django REST Framework and React with modern responsive design.

sections.technologiesDesc: Leveraging modern tools and frameworks to build a robust solution
